text:
‘Being seen together at the Oscars will make a big, big statement,’ says a source. ‘Jen saw how all eyes were on her and Ange at the Golden Globes, so she feels the industry night of nights will be the perfect setting to show everyone that she and Brad are moving on from the past and are officially back in each other’s lives.’

Tired of keeping their friendship a secret, Jen is also planning to dish all the details to her pal Ellen DeGeneres on her talk show, including her plans to once again become involved with Plan B – the production company they founded as a couple shortly before they split.

‘Jen just wants everything out in the open so they can move on,’ says a source. ‘She’s excited about not only having Brad back in her life again, but also about the possibility of working on a project together, too. She’s got nothing to hide and wants to share her happiness.’
title: Brad and Jen’s big announcement: ‘We’re in love again’
